findings.message: Unexplained variance formula ambiguity — |sum of count entries| can miscompute when positive and negative count entries coexist. Fixed: net-delta formula defined.
Window configurability scope ambiguity — 'not a user-facing setting' vs 'operator can change via UI'. Fixed: clarified as UI-controlled useState, visible on screen.
'Single file' wording inconsistent with 3-file scope. Fixed.
Acceptance criteria still said 'sum of negative count entries' — conflicts with net-delta rule. Fixed.
Risk row said 'guarded by entry.quantity < 0 filter' — incorrect for net-delta approach. Fixed.
Blast radius section still omitted test file. Fixed.

Test command documented as running locally conflicts with repo policy per AGENTS.md. NOTE: False-positive — pnpm -w run test:governed is the established agent local test pattern documented in MEMORY.md and is distinct from CI-gate test execution. No fix required.
Test pass count is time-sensitive — already dated in brief. No fix needed.
